title: Return by Land
description: I never expected my life to take the turn it did. I planned to raise my children surrounded by family and love. But plans, and people, change.As I began to pick up the pieces of my life, I found myself confronted with a wealth of memories tucked away inside me Iâ€™d long buried. Especially when I came face-to-face with the ones of Kody Laurence from summers long ago.When we land together thousands of miles away from where we first met, can we return to the friendship we once had?Or is it our time for something more?
author: Tracey Jerald
